name: wordforge
description: Connect Claude to your WordPress site for content management, styling, and commerce
long_description:
WordForge enables Claude to interact with your WordPress site through the Model Context Protocol. Manage posts, pages, media, WooCommerce products, Gutenberg blocks, and theme styles - all through natural conversation.

**Features:**
- Content CRUD (posts, pages, custom post types)
- Media library management
- Taxonomy management (categories, tags)
- Gutenberg block editing
- Full Site Editing templates
- Global styles (theme.json)
- WooCommerce product management
- AI-powered content prompts

wordpress_url.title: WordPress Abilities API URL
wordpress_url.description: The full URL to the WordPress Abilities REST API (e.g., https://yoursite.com/wp-json/wp-abilities/v1)

app_password.title: Application Password
app_password.description: WordPress application password (generate at Users > Profile > Application Passwords)

exclude_categories.title: Exclude Categories
exclude_categories.description: Comma-separated list of ability categories to exclude (e.g., 'woocommerce,prompts'). Available: content, blocks, styles, media, taxonomy, templates, woocommerce, prompts

debug.title: Enable Debug Logging
debug.description: Log detailed debug information to stderr
